model_evaluation-with-ADSEvaluator.ipynb.title: Model Evaluation with ADSEvaluator
model_evaluation-with-ADSEvaluator.ipynb.summary: Train and evaluate different types of models: binary classification using an imbalanced dataset, multi-class classification using a synthetically generated dataset consisting of three equally distributed classes, and a regression using a synthetically generated dataset with positive targets.

caltech-pedestrian_detection-oracle_open.title: Caltech Pedestrian Detection Benchmark Repository
caltech-pedestrian_detection-oracle_open.summary: Download and process annotated video data of vehicles and pedestrians.

accelerate-scikit_learn-with-intel_exten.title: Intel Extension for Scikit-Learn
accelerate-scikit_learn-with-intel_exten.summary: Enhance performance of scikit-learn models using the Intel(R) oneAPI Data Analytics Library. Train a k-means model using both sklearn and the accelerated Intel library and compare performance.

pipelines-ml_lifecycle.ipynb.title: Working with Pipelines [Limited Availability]
pipelines-ml_lifecycle.ipynb.summary: Create and use ML pipelines through the entire machine learning lifecycle

streaming-service-introduction.ipynb.title: Introduction to Streaming
streaming-service-introduction.ipynb.summary: Connect to Oracle Cloud Insfrastructure (OCI) Streaming service with kafka.

natural_language_processing.ipynb.title: Natural Language Processing
natural_language_processing.ipynb.summary: Use the ADS SDK to process and manipulate strings. This notebook includes regular expression matching and natural language (NLP) parsing, including part-of-speech tagging, named entity recognition, and sentiment analysis. It also shows how to create and use custom plugins specific to your specific needs.
